thread.title: Brianna Jarmon
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Brianna Jarmon

author: Brianna Jarmon
title: Brianna Jarmon
text: About two Saturdays ago I walked into the Town East location and I was instantly greeted with warm and welcoming smiles. I was told about the latest promotions and sales and I was even offered water and ice cream which was much needed on that day! I found the most amazing deal on a Paris themed chair that I have been wanting for months. I paid for the chair that day and by the following Tuesday it was shipped to the store on time and I was called to come and pick it up. I loved the customer service and I loved how quick and easy it was to place my order. I would definitely be back to shop there!
